Sure! Here is the extracted text in clean Markdown format:

### Section 1, Module 1: Reading and Writing

**Directions**

In February 1864, James Johnson joined the US Army. He went on to serve in the 18th New York Cavalry during the US Civil War and, _____ earned a place in US history as one of the war’s few Chinese-born American soldiers.

**21**  
Which choice completes the text with the most logical transition?  
A) usually,  
B) for instance,  
C) in any case,  
D) in doing so,

questions.passage_text: In February 1864, James Johnson joined the US Army. He went on to serve in the 18th New York Cavalry during the US Civil War and, _____ earned a place in US history as one of the war’s few Chinese-born American soldiers.
questions.question_text: Which choice completes the text with the most logical transition?
questions.explanation: The transition 'in doing so' logically connects his service to earning a historical place.
